chartbeat.title: NCAAM College Basketball Scores - NCAAM Scoreboard - ESPN

content.description: Real-time NCAAM College Basketball scores on ESPN
content.keywords: NCAAM Scores, NCAAM scoreboard, College Basketball Scores, College Basketball scoreboard

headlines.description: Keita Bates-Diop finished with 24 points and 14 rebounds and C.J. Jackson made a long 3-pointer with 1.7 seconds left in double overtime to give No. 16 Ohio State an 80-78 victory at Indiana on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 16 Buckeyes keep title hopes alive with win at Indiana

headlines.description: Jeff Dowtin scored 20 points, E.C. Matthews added 18 and No. 18 Rhode Island wrapped up its first outright Atlantic-10 regular-season title with an 81-56 victory over Dayton on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 18 Rhode Island wins first outright Atlantic-10 title

video.headline: URI clinches A-10 outright for first time in school history

headlines.description: — T.J. Henderson had 12 points off the bench to carry IUPUI to a 66-56 win over Wright St. on Friday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Henderson scores 12 to carry IUPUI past Wright St. 66-56

headlines.description: Demetre Rivers scored 22 points and Mercer defeated The Citadel 83-70 on Friday for the Bears' seventh consecutive victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rivers scores 22, Mercer wins seventh straight, 82-70

headlines.description: Tre'Shaun Fletcher scored 28 points with nine assists, Jaelan Sanford hit a season-high five 3-pointers in scoring 23 and Mid-American West leader Toledo used 60 percent 3-point shooting in beating Central Michigan 89-76 on Friday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Toledo shoots 60 percent from arc, beats Chippewas 89-76

headlines.description: Cameron Jackson had 18 points and seven rebounds on Friday night and Wofford knocked off conference-leading East Tennessee State 75-71.
Andrew Brown made six 3-pointers and finished with 22 points to lead Furman to a 78-55 victory over Western Carolina on Friday night for its fifth straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brown's 6 treys lead Furman over Western Carolina 78-55

headlines.description: Marvin Smith and Isaiah Miller scored 14 points apiece for UNC Greensboro in a 72-51 victory over Chattanooga on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Smith, Miller lead UNC Greensboro over Chattanooga 72-51

headlines.description: Eric Adams had 13 points and 12 rebounds Friday night and Samford held on for an 89-82 win over VMI.
Kahlil Dukes scored 26 points and Niagara won its regular-season finale 100-76 over Marist on Friday night.
Sam Idowu had 11 points and 10 rebounds to lead Saint Peter's to a 52-43 victory over Quinnipiac on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saint Peter's snaps 3-game skid, beats Quinnipiac 52-43

headlines.description: Mike Smith scored 24 points, Gabe Stefanini added 19 and Columbia held off Brown for an 89-82 win on Friday night.

video.headline: Columbia claims 89-82 win over Brown   - Via Ivy League

headlines.description: Trey Phills stole a pass and scored what proved to be the winning points with eight seconds left as Yale escaped with an 82-80 victory over Cornell on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Phills' steal and basket leads to Yale's 82-80 win

video.headline: Yale Outlasts Cornell, 82-80  - Via Ivy League

headlines.description: Ryan Betley and Caleb Wood scored 12 points apiece, and Pennsylvania routed cold-shooting Dartmouth 74-46 on Friday night.

video.headline: Penn Tops Dartmouth, 74-46  - Via Ivy League

headlines.description: Justin Bassey had 18 points Friday night and Harvard pulled away in overtime to beat Princeton 72-66 and maintain its hold on first place in the Ivy League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Harvard pulls away from Princeton in OT, stays tied atop Ivy

headlines.description: Lavone Holland II scored 25 points and Northern Kentucky beat Illinois-Chicago 79-72 on Friday night to move atop the Horizon League standings.
headlines.shortLinkText: Northern Kentucky moves atop Horizon, beats UIC 79-72

headlines.description: Reggie Jones had 20 points, seven rebounds and five assists and Western Michigan beat Ball State 87-80 and snapped the Cardinals' five-game winning streak on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Western Michigan ends Ball State's 5-game win streak 87-80

headlines.description: Schadrac Casimir made five 3-pointers and scored a season-high 30 points and Iona defeated Manhattan 88-75 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Casimir scores season-high 30 in Iona's 88-75 victory

nowFeed.headline: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.
nowFeed.story: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.

nowFeed.headline:
Arkansas senior Dustin Thomas has been dismissed from the team, effective immediately, for a violation of team rules. 

Has played at least 18 minutes in 12 of the Razorbacks' last 15 games.
nowFeed.story:
Arkansas senior Dustin Thomas has been dismissed from the team, effective immediately, for a violation of team rules.

nowFeed.headline: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.
nowFeed.story: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.

nowFeed.headline: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past — and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."
nowFeed.story: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past — and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."

nowFeed.headline: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.
nowFeed.story: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.

nowFeed.headline: Nojel Eastern has had some moments this week for Purdue. Has been very good defensively, his size causing some problems for Tony Carr yesterday, being used on Zavier Simpson today. Also has six points today.

nowFeed.headline:
Michigan's Jon Teske has 12 points in 10 minutes so far today. 

In Michigan's last 11 games, Jon Teske had scored a combined 19 points.

nowFeed.headline: Battle of the big men so far here at Madison Square Garden. Isaac Haas has all seven points for Purdue; Moe Wagner and Jon Teske combining for all nine for Michigan.
nowFeed.story: Battle of the big men so far here at Madison Square Garden. Isaac Haas has all seven points for Purdue; Moe Wagner and Jon Teske combining for all nine for Michigan.

nowFeed.headline: Radford was picked seventh in the Big South preseason polls. They finished as the two seed. Now they are going dancing! Radford Big South Champions.

nowFeed.headline: At one point this season Arizona State was ranked No. 3 in the AP poll. Now, after losing to Stanford yesterday, the Sun Devils have just a 23% chance to reach the NCAA tournament, per BPI.

nowFeed.headline:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.
nowFeed.story:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.

nowFeed.headline: When asked to put into words the week that was, Arizona Head Coach Sean Miller used "devastating" and "remarkable."  U of A clinched the PAC-12 regular season title with a 66-54 victory over California.

nowFeed.headline: Duke trails by 3, but it's been a night of missed opportunities - and shots - for the Blue Devils. They are 1-8 from behind the arc, including this shot, which feel about six inches short.
